00024         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00025         {
00026             
00027             this.tblViewOrder.Visible = true;
00028             this.formEditOrder.Visible = false;            
00029 
00030             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00031 
00032             int userID = getUserID();
00033 
00034             IQueryable<Order> orders_User = OrderUtilities.getOrdersByUser(userID, Response);// getOrdersByUser(userID);
00035                         
00036             foreach (Order current_order in orders_User)
00037             {
00038                 TableRow row = new TableRow();
00039 
00040                 TableCell cellOrderID = new TableCell();
00041                 TableCell cellJobName = new TableCell();
00042                 TableCell cellPrice = new TableCell();
00043                 TableCell cellStatus = new TableCell();
00044                 TableCell cellDate = new TableCell();
00045                 TableCell cellEdit = new TableCell();
00046                 TableCell cellView = new TableCell();
00047 
00048 
00049                 cellOrderID.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(current_order.orderID.ToString()));
00050                 cellJobName.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(current_order.job_name.ToString()));
00051                 cellPrice.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(getOrderPrice(current_order.orderID)));
00052                 cellStatus.Controls.Add(getStatusControl(current_order));
00053                 cellDate.Controls.Add(new LiteralControl(OrderUtilities.getCurrentOrderStatusDate(current_order.orderID)));
00054                 cellEdit.Controls.Add(getEditButton(current_order));
00055                 cellView.Controls.Add(getViewButton(current_order));
00056 
00057                 //pixels
00058                 //cellEdit.Width = Unit.Pixel(50);
00059                 //cellView.Width = Unit.Pixel(50);
00060                 cellOrderID.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00061                 cellJobName.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);
00062                 cellPrice.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00063                 cellStatus.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00064                 cellDate.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);
00065 
00066                 //Center
00067                 cellEdit.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00068                 cellDate.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00069                 cellStatus.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00070                 cellOrderID.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00071                 cellPrice.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00072                 cellView.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00073 
00074                 row.Cells.Add(cellEdit);
00075                 row.Cells.Add(cellView);
00076                 row.Cells.Add(cellOrderID);
00077                 row.Cells.Add(cellJobName);
00078                 row.Cells.Add(cellPrice);
00079                 row.Cells.Add(cellStatus);
00080                 row.Cells.Add(cellDate);               
00081 
00082                 row.CssClass = "orderRow";
00083 
00084                 this.orderHistoryTable.Rows.Add(row);
00085             }
00086         }

00088         private Control getViewButton(Order current_order)
00089         {          
00090             Control retControl = null;
00091 
00092             if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.All))
00093             {
00094                 ImageButton viewButton = new ImageButton();
00095 
00096                 viewButton.ID = current_order.orderID + "v";
00097                 viewButton.CommandArgument = current_order.orderID.ToString();
00098                 viewButton.ImageUrl = "/images/left-list.gif";                
00099                 viewButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_View);
00100 
00101                 retControl = viewButton;
00102             }
00103             else if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.Self)
00104                     && OrderUtilities.isMyOrder(current_order.orderID,getUserID()))
00105             {
00106                 ImageButton viewButton = new ImageButton();
00107 
00108                 viewButton.ID = current_order.orderID + "v";
00109                 viewButton.CommandArgument = current_order.orderID.ToString();
00110                 viewButton.ImageUrl = "/images/left-list.gif";
00111                 viewButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_View);
00112 
00113                 retControl = viewButton;
00114             }
00115             else
00116             {
00117                 Image image = new Image();
00118                 image.ImageUrl = "/images/left-list_gray.gif";
00119                 retControl = image;
00120             }
00121 
00122             return retControl;
00123         }

00125         private Control getEditButton(Order current_order)
00126         {
00127 
00128             Control retControl = null;
00129             
00130             if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.All) 
00131                 && (current_order.Status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED 
00132                     || current_order.Status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_PAID))
00133             {
00134                 ImageButton editButton = new ImageButton();
00135                 editButton.ID = current_order.orderID + "e";
00136                 editButton.CommandArgument = current_order.orderID.ToString();
00137                 editButton.ImageUrl = "/images/edit.gif";
00138                 editButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_Edit);
00139                 retControl = editButton;
00140             }
00141             else if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.Self) 
00142                     && current_order.Status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED  
00143                     && OrderUtilities.isMyOrder(current_order.orderID,getUserID()))
00144             {
00145                 ImageButton editButton = new ImageButton();
00146                 editButton.ID = current_order.orderID + "e";
00147                 editButton.CommandArgument = current_order.orderID.ToString();
00148                 editButton.ImageUrl = "/images/edit.gif";
00149                 editButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_Edit);
00150                 retControl = editButton;
00151             }
00152             else
00153             {
00154                 Image image = new Image();
00155                 image.ImageUrl = "/images/edit_gray.gif";
00156                 retControl = image;
00157             }
00158 
00159             return retControl;
00160         }

00162         private Control getStatusControl(Order currentOrder)
00163         {
00164             Status status = currentOrder.Status;
00165 
00166             Control ret = new LiteralControl("---");
00167             Button payButton;
00168 
00169             if (status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED)
00170             {
00171                 payButton = new Button();
00172                 payButton.ID = currentOrder.orderID + "s";
00173                 payButton.Text = "Pay Now";
00174                 payButton.Visible = true;
00175                 payButton.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);                
00176                 payButton.CommandArgument = currentOrder.orderID.ToString();
00177                 payButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_Pay);                
00178 
00179                 ret = payButton;
00180             }
00181             else
00182             {
00183                 ret = new LiteralControl(status.statusName);
00184             }
00185 
00186             return ret;
00187         }

00189         private void func_Pay(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00190         {
00191             this.lblNotify.Text = "Order Sucessfully Paid!";
00192             this.lblNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Blue;
00193             this.lblNotify.Visible = true;
00194 
00195             int orderID = System.Int32.Parse(e.CommandArgument.ToString());
00196             RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>().UpdateOrderStatus(orderID, 2);
00197 
00198             Response.Redirect(Request.Url.ToString());
00199         }

00201         private void func_Edit(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00202         {
00203             this.formEditOrder.Visible = true;
00204             this.tblViewOrder.Visible = false;
00205 
00206             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00207 
00208             int orderID =  System.Int32.Parse(e.CommandArgument.ToString());
00209             Session["PWAS_order_id"] = orderID;
00210                                     
00211             Order current_order = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00212 
00213             this.txtJobName.Text = current_order.job_name;
00214             this.txtFinalSizeX.Text = current_order.width.ToString();
00215             this.txtFinalSizeY.Text = current_order.height.ToString();
00216             this.txtQty.Text = current_order.quantity.ToString();
00217             this.lstFinish.SelectedIndex = this.lstFinish.Items.IndexOf(lstFinish.Items.FindByText(current_order.stock_finish));
00218             this.lstWeight.SelectedIndex = this.lstWeight.Items.IndexOf(lstWeight.Items.FindByText(current_order.stock_weight));
00219             this.chkTwoSide.Checked = current_order.two_sided;
00220             this.chkfolded.Checked = current_order.folded;
00221             this.chkShip.Checked = current_order.ship;
00222             
00223         }
00224 
00225         protected void func_Save(object sender, EventArgs e)
00226         {
00227             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00228 
00229             if (Session["PWAS_order_id"] != null)
00230             {
00231                 int orderID = System.Int32.Parse(Session["PWAS_order_id"].ToString());   
00232                 Order orderEdit = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00233 
00234                 if (validateFields())
00235                 {
00236                     orderEdit.userID = getUserID();
00237                     orderEdit.job_name = this.txtJobName.Text;
00238                     orderEdit.width = Int32.Parse(this.txtFinalSizeX.Text);
00239                     orderEdit.height = Int32.Parse(this.txtFinalSizeY.Text);
00240                     orderEdit.quantity = Int32.Parse(this.txtQty.Text);
00241                     orderEdit.stock_finish = this.lstFinish.SelectedValue;
00242                     orderEdit.stock_weight = this.lstWeight.SelectedValue;
00243                     orderEdit.two_sided = this.chkTwoSide.Checked;
00244                     orderEdit.folded = this.chkfolded.Checked;
00245                     orderEdit.ship = this.chkShip.Checked;
00246                     orderEdit.price = calculatePrice(orderEdit);
00247 
00248                     orderRepository.SubmitChanges();
00249 
00250                     this.lblNotify.Text = "Order Edited Sucessfully!  ";
00251                     this.lblNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Blue;
00252                     this.lblNotify.Visible = true;
00253                     func_clearFields(false);
00254 
00255                     Response.Redirect("customer_view_order.aspx");
00256 
00257                 }
00258             }
00259             else
00260             {
00261                 Response.Redirect("customer_view_order.aspx");
00262             }
00263         }
00264 
00265         private decimal calculatePrice(Order orderCreate)
00266         {         
00267             decimal price = 0;
00268             //----------calculate the price
00269             price = (decimal)(orderCreate.quantity * (0.5*orderCreate.width * orderCreate.height));
00270             //----------------------------
00271             return price;
00272         
00273         }

00275         private void func_View(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00276         {
00277             int orderID = System.Int32.Parse(e.CommandArgument.ToString());
00278             Session["PWAS_order_id"] = orderID;
00279             Response.Redirect("view_Single_Order.aspx");
00280         }

00287         private string getOrderPrice(int orderID)
00288         {
00289             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00290             Order current_order = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00291             return string.Format("{0:C}",current_order.price);             
00292         }

00294         private void func_clearFields(bool notify)
00295         {
00296             if (notify)
00297                 this.lblNotify.Visible = false;
00298             this.txtJobName.Text = "";
00299             this.txtFinalSizeX.Text = "";
00300             this.txtFinalSizeY.Text = "";
00301             this.txtQty.Text = "";
00302             this.chkTwoSide.Checked = false;
00303             this.chkfolded.Checked = false;
00304             this.chkShip.Checked = false;
00305         }
00306         private int getUserID()
00307         {
00308             if (Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID] == null)
00309                 Response.Redirect("index.aspx");
00310             return (int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID];
00311         }
00312         private bool validateFields()
00313         {
00314             int test;
00315 
00316             bool ret = true;
00317             if (this.txtJobName.Text == ""
00318                 || this.txtFinalSizeX.Text == ""
00319                 || this.txtFinalSizeY.Text == ""
00320                 || this.txtQty.Text == "")
00321             {
00322                 this.lblNotify.Text = "You need to complete all the fields!";
00323                 this.lblNotify.Visible = true;
00324                 this.lblNotify.BorderColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00325                 this.lblNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00326                 ret = false;
00327             }
00328             try
00329             {
00330                 test = Int32.Parse(this.txtFinalSizeX.Text);
00331                 test = Int32.Parse(this.txtFinalSizeY.Text);
00332                 test = Int32.Parse(this.txtQty.Text);
00333             }
00334             catch (FormatException)
00335             {
00336                 this.lblNotify.Text = "Bad Input in some field that are Integer required";
00337                 this.lblNotify.Visible = true;
00338                 this.lblNotify.BorderColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00339                 this.lblNotify.ForeColor = System.Drawing.Color.Red;
00340                 ret = false;
00341             }
00342             return ret;
00343         }
